TEXT: You can play characters with #rGuro Content enabled while having #gSFW Mode on, or you can play freely with #gSFW Mode off and #rGuro Content enabled. NL Please configure this in the mod options tab on the main menu.
Got hurt? Don’t worry! NL After taking damage, all injury-related effects will trigger, but you won’t actually lose HP.

You can play characters with #rGuro Content enabled while having #gSFW Mode on, or you can play freely with #gSFW Mode off and #rGuro Content enabled. NL Please configure this in the mod options tab on the main menu.
